description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Shoot hoops with your avatar to be the best scorer in the world! Six courts and six different game modes are waiting for you in the firts "basketball" game with zombies on it!
